name: Kiroe
description:
OVERVIEW :

Kiroe is a 3D Hack&Slash game : Travel through numerous planets to liberate and protect the citizens imprisoned by goblins.

STORY :

After having lived in hiding for a long time, the goblins emerged from their underground terrain and invaded the planets of Floater's, imprisoning all citizens in their path. Only Floater's castle resisted this attack thanks to its courageous guards.
Go to the castle, explore the planets, free the villagers and protect them from the waves of monsters.

FOLLOW KIROE :

- Website : http://kiroe.fr/

- Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/playKiroe

-Steam : in developpement
